title: Visit mycubs.com
custom_preconds: GIVEN user visits website mycubs.com on mobile phone
custom_steps: WHEN user goes to the website mycubs.com
custom_expected: THEN the user sees a login page with a sign in button

title: My Cubs Login Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on a mobile phone and typed in URL mycubs.com from the browser
custom_steps: WHEN the sign in button is tapped
custom_expected:
THEN the user has two option; login or registration
AND
With login the user has two fields for input (email address, password) and Login button
AND 
With registration the user has 5 input fields (email address,password,confirm password, Date of birth (mm,dd,yyyy), zip code) 1 check box option for newsletters and promotions from MLB and partners and Register button

title: Forgot Password Option
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has tapped on the sign in button on my cubs.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Forgot Password hyperlink
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be prompted to enter their email address and tap send
AND the user will receive instructions on resetting their password
BUT if the user puts in an invalid email address to reset their password, a message alert "this account does not exist"

title: My Cubs Registration Option
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has tapped on the sign in page on my cubs.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user has filled out the registration section and tapped the register button of the login page
custom_expected:
THEN the user is successfully registered and directed to the account number page
BUT if the user has not fully completed the required fields then alert message "The following fields need to be filled out"

title: Account Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is  on a mobile device and has successfully logged in via the lyon page at mycubs.com
custom_steps: WHEN the user types in their account number
custom_expected:
THEN the user is directed to the user detail page
BUT if the user put in an invalid account number, user id redirected to Rejection page

title: Account Details page (header)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com with a valid login and account number
custom_steps: WHEN the user is logged in and views the header information
custom_expected: THEN the user sees the following information: First Name, Last Name, Status, Account number, Bar code (based off the account number)

title: Account Details page (body)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com with a valid login and account number
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the body of the account details page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the following information: Ticket Info (next game listed where user has game tickets available, date and time of game, what teams are playing, # of tickets (link to e tickets)
AND ticket administration (Manage All Tickets)
AND Rewards (point amount)
AND Cubs Cash (amount listed)
AND update status
AND My Cubs FAQs
AND At the Ballpark

title: Account Details page (footer)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com with a valid login and account number
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the footer piece of the account details page
custom_expected: THEN the user will see 3 hyperlinks: cubs.com, Terms of use, Private Policy

title: Account Details page (App)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com with a valid login and account number
custom_steps: WHEN the user is at the detail page, the user will tap the app icon (iPhone)
custom_expected: THEN the user will download the my cubs app to the mobile device home screen

title: User Detail (Tickets)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com is on the account details page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the tickets button at the tickets section on the account details page
custom_expected:
THEN the uses goes to the eticket information
AND verifies the ticket number on the ticket button (i.e. 5 tickets) match the number of tickets for the game
AND verifies correct tickets (dates,seats,team etc)

title: User Detail (Manage all tickets)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com is on the account details page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the arrow on the Manage All Tickets section on the account details page
custom_expected: THEN the user has access to all tickets information for that account

title: User Detail (Rewards)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com is on the account details page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the arrow on the Rewards section on the account details page
custom_expected: THEN the user is directed to the loyalty portal for that account

title: User Detail (Cubs cash)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com is on the account details page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the arrow on the Cubs Cash section on the account details page
custom_expected: THEN the user directed to the eCash portal for that account

title: User Detail (Update status)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com is on the account details page
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the updated section on the account details page
custom_expected: THEN the user views the last updated time for that account

title: User Detail (My Cubs FAQ)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com is on the account details page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the arrow on the My Cubs FAQ section on the account details page
custom_expected:
THEN the user directed to the MY Cubs FAQ page
AND the user will be able to tap on the FAQs hyperlinks for the answers to the specific FAQ that is tapped

title: User Detail (At The Ballpark)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a mobile device and has successfully logged into my cubs.com is on the account details page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the arrow on the At The Ballpark section on the account details page
custom_expected: THEN the user directed to At The Ballpark app
